attributes.action: encourage the use of community pubs by reducing duty on draught products and removing the anti competitive PubCo tie.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call upon the government to encourage the use of community pubs by reducing the duty on draught products.We ask that they also ensure supermarkets are not permitted to sell alcohol at heavily discounted prices and that PubCo's should be required to pass on more of their bulk buying discounts,
